November 08, 2016

Computer Graphics: How to Install JOGL in Eclipse Windows 7

How to install JOGL in Eclipse Windows 7

  • The official installation guide is attached here.
  • Firstly, a complete package of jogamp should be downloaded (which includes jogl packages) from this link.
  • Copy jogamp package to default Eclipse workspace directory, and unzip.
  • Set up JOGL in Eclipse according to official instructions. Which is, to create a specific library package for JOGL, such that everytime we need to create an application which uses JOGL package, we refer to that specific JOGL package.
